text: The Ferrari F40 is a sports car produced by Ferrari from 1987 to 1992. Starting at approximately $400,000, it has a twin-turbo V8 engine that made it one of the fastest cars of its time, reaching a top speed of about 367 km/h (228 mph). Designed to celebrate Ferrari's 40th anniversary, the F40 was the last car approved by Enzo Ferrari himself and remains a highly prized collector's car today. Category:Ferrari
title: Ferrari F40
